metadata.title: CVE-2017-14502 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
read_header in archive_read_support_format_rar.c in libarchive 3.3.2suffers from an off-by-one error for UTF-16 names in RAR archives, leadingto an out-of-bounds read in archive_read_format_rar_read_header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14502` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.2.2-3.1ubuntu0.2
bsdtar - 3.2.2-3.1ubuntu0.2
libarchive-tools - 3.2.2-3.1ubuntu0.2
libarchive13 - 3.2.2-3.1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.2-3.1ubuntu0.2').
